text: Di madagoaa digau dauwa o Israel ala ne lloo ia gi di nadau guongo i muli di taaligi o Goliath, gei nia ahina o nia waahale huogodoo o Israel ga lloo ia belee hagalaamua di king go Saul. Digaula e dadaahili i nia daahili tenetene, ge e gagaalege, e badubadu nadau mee hai daahili mo nadau ‘lyre’.Di ‘lyre’
